reviews.review:
Where do I even start? This game is an absolute masterpiece. The gameplay is fun and original, even for a game that's been out for over a decade. No other game that I've played matches the exquisite balance that Portal 2 strikes between fun and engaging puzzles and the real star of the show here: the story. I won't spoil anything here, but the story is brilliantly executed and funny through the entire game. 
My only regret is that I can never again experience this game for the first time. If you haven't played it yet, set aside a weekend and enjoy.
masterpiece. if you haven't experienced this game do it immediately.

A quality game that stands the test of time
you'll be hard pressed to not enjoy it

Just a great game. An interesting walkthrough of a fascinating story that draws attention to scientific research of the future, which is tested by the present and at the end changes for everyone. Creating and exploring puzzles is a way to pass the time by completing challenges for fun. They make you think about which way to go when the exit is near. Where one cannot get through, you can always take a friend with you to the company. A good place to relax and train your mind.
